item.title: 萨克斯在无问题债权人电话会议中披露亏损 1 亿美元

item.title: 阿尔伯塔野火逼近油砂，威胁更多产量
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省的野火正威胁着近 50 万桶原油的日产量，因为高温和大风将火焰逼近大型油砂井场。【原文：Wildfires in Alberta are threatening almost half a million barrels of daily crude production as heat and wind push the flames closer to massive oil sands well sites.】

item.description: 经济学家们放弃了对加拿大下周放松货币政策的呼吁，因为交易员们认为降息的可能性很小，而且加拿大的产出超出了所有预期。【原文：Economists are abandoning their calls for monetary-policy easing in Canada next week as traders price in only a small chance of an interest-rate cut and the nation’s output beat all estimates.】

item.title: 深假复仇色情是人工智能时代的网络恐怖故事
item.description: 2025 年 5 月 19 日星期一，美国华盛顿特区白宫玫瑰园，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与美国第一夫人梅拉尼娅-特朗普（Melania Trump）在《删除法案》（S. 146）签署仪式上并肩讲话。特朗普签署了一项法案，迫使社交媒体公司删除未经同意在网上分享的露骨性图像，并称这是一种 "可怕的错误"。摄影师：Samuel Corum/Bloomberg【原文：US President Donald Trump speaks alongside US First Lady Melania Trump during a signing ceremony for S. 146, the Take It Down Act, in the Rose Garden of the White House in Washington, DC, US, on Monday, May 19, 2025. Trump signed a bill to force social media companies to remove non-consensual sharing of explicit sexual imagery online, calling it a “horribly wrong” situation. Photographer: Samuel Corum/Bloomberg】

item.title: 德国商业银行分析师称美国对外国资金征税是权力游戏
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）外汇研究主管 Ulrich Leuchtmann 认为，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的税收和支出旗舰法案中的一项拟议措施表明，美国政府正在探索新的工具，以迫使其他国家屈从于其意志。【原文：A proposed measure in Donald Trump’s flagship tax-and-spending bill is a sign that the US administration is exploring new tools to force other countries to bend to its will, according to Ulrich Leuchtmann, head of FX research at Commerzbank AG.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星公司正在商谈将法国的股份翻倍，融资 15 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）是一家欧洲卫星运营商，致力于与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）竞争，该公司正在与投资者谈判，希望在一项交易中融资 15 亿欧元，这将使法国政府的持股比例增加一倍多，达到 30%。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA, the European satellite operator working to rival Elon Musk’s Starlink, is in talks with investors to raise €1.5 billion in a deal that would more than double the French government’s stake to 30%, people familiar with the matter said.】
